page.description: This syntax produces a color picker that displays the Alpha Anywhere color palette and returns a color name.

argument.name: Mode
argument.description: Optional. Character. Defines the format of the Default_Color value. Allowable values are "RGB" or "HEX".

argument.name: Default_Color
argument.description: Optional. Character. The default color in RGB ("n1,n2,n3") or hexadecimal ("A1,B2,C3") formats.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim default_color as C dim new_color as C default_color="7F,7F,7F" ui_dlg_box("Title",<<%dlg% [%P=a5_color_picker("HEX",default_color)%.20new_color]; %dlg%) ui_msg_box("",""+new_color)
